appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Guard against CSS data exfiltration attacks.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

checkboxEnablingText.description: The text showed to the user for enabling the security (or not) in the popup.

version.description: Change this only if in the languages you translate version is writter with another spelling.
